title: Girls Like Me Don't Cry
lyrics: Tone tell me that u keep me safe and never let this fade away i’m hiding out so they don't see this part of me girls like me don’t cry girls like me pre tend we don’t cry girls like me don’t cry girls like me pre tend we don’t cry tell me that u keep me safe and never let this fade away girls like me don’t cry girls like me pre tend we don’t cry lost in the city both eyes wide ran right through all my options can't seem to keep my eyes both dry got tissues in my pocket i’m sensitive prolly wanna duck when i throw a fit been through some shit wear my heart on my sleeve so it's hard to miss tell me that u keep me safe and never let this fade away i’m hiding out so they don't see this part of me girls like me don’t cry girls like me pre tend we don’t cry girls like me don’t cry girls like me pre tend we don’t cry tell me that u keep me safe and never let this fade away girls like me don’t cry girls like me pre tend we don’t cry they say girl don't cry try to keep my head up high smile like it’s alright but all i want to do is hide gotta let it go don't wanna keep this all inside girls like me don’t cry girls like me pre tend we don’t cry girls like me don’t cry girls like me pre tend we don’t cry tell me that u keep me safe and never let this fade away girls like me don’t cry girls like me pre tend we don’t cry
